pageProduct.name: Palmers Shea Formula Moisture Repair Shampoo 473ml
pageProduct.description:
Common Uses

Nourishes and smoothes, enhancing shine and  protecting colour.

Directions

Apply to wet hair and gently massage into a rich lather. Rinse thoroughly.
